resources.string: 每日精选视频推荐，让你大开眼界
Daily appetizer for your eyes.Widen horizon.
每日编辑精选，一句既往\nDaily appetizers for your eyes,as always
关注越多，发现越多\nSubscribe more,discover a whole lot more
离线自动缓存，精彩用不下线\nEnjoy your daily eyepetit,even without connectivity
登录即可订阅、评论和同步已收藏视频\nSign in to comment,collect video,to subscript also
